Instruction: In a food processor, pulse the green olives until finely chopped.
In a bowl, combine the chopped green olives, crumbled feta cheese, chopped fresh basil leaves, and extra virgin olive oil.
Arrange the baguette slices on a baking sheet and toast them in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until lightly golden.
Remove the toasted baguette slices from the oven.
Spread the green olive and feta cheese mixture generously on each toasted baguette slice.
Serve immediately as a delightful appetizer.
